channel.title: HHTown on egoodwin.io
channel.description: Recent content in HHTown on egoodwin.io

item.title: That felt good! Dynamo vs. Galaxy
item.description: What a game! Not the prettiest soccer I’ve ever seen, but being in the stands for the Dynamo/LA Galaxy game felt good. At this point we’ve: Been undefeated at home this season Maintained a clean sheet at home for all three games Got a player (Amine Bassi) who has gone four games and scored a penalty shot in each game. This is the longest consecutive penalty shot streak in MLS history.
